definition: (slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. to 背殺|背杀[bei4 sha1]
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
(slang) (usu. of a woman) sb who looks stunning from behind/sb who has a great figure but not necessarily an attractive face/abbr. for 背影殺手|背影杀手[bei4 ying3 sha1 shou3]
(Internet slang) flattering photo (pun on 照片[zhao4 pian4])/photoshopped picture
(of a woman) to have nice curves/buxom/shapely
a person's face as seen from the front
ugly people will do all kinds of weird things to get attention (idiom)
